00039 /* exploit C++ ability of default values for function parameters */
00040 #ifndef DEFAULT
00041 #   ifdef __cplusplus
00042 #       define DEFAULT(x)  =x
00043 #   else
00044 #       define DEFAULT(x)
00045 #   endif
00046 #endif

00048 /* MP4 API types */
00049 typedef void*       MP4FileHandle;
00050 typedef uint32_t    MP4TrackId;
00051 typedef uint32_t    MP4SampleId;
00052 typedef uint64_t    MP4Timestamp;
00053 typedef uint64_t    MP4Duration;
00054 typedef uint32_t    MP4EditId;
00055 
00056 typedef uint64_t (*VIRTUALIO_GETFILELENGTH)(void *user); // return file length in bytes
00057 typedef int (*VIRTUALIO_SETPOSITION)(void *user, uint64_t position); // return 0 on success
00058 typedef int (*VIRTUALIO_GETPOSITION)(void *user, uint64_t *position); // fill position, return 0 on success
00059 typedef size_t (*VIRTUALIO_READ)(void *user, void *buffer, size_t size); // return number of bytes actually read
00060 typedef size_t (*VIRTUALIO_WRITE)(void *user, void *buffer, size_t size); // return number of bytes actually written
00061 typedef int (*VIRTUALIO_ENDOFFILE)(void *user); // return 1 if file hit EOF
00062 typedef int (*VIRTUALIO_CLOSE)(void *user); // return 0 on success
00063 
00064 typedef struct Virtual_IO
00065 {
00066     VIRTUALIO_GETFILELENGTH GetFileLength;
00067     VIRTUALIO_SETPOSITION SetPosition;
00068     VIRTUALIO_GETPOSITION GetPosition;
00069     VIRTUALIO_READ Read;
00070     VIRTUALIO_WRITE Write;
00071     VIRTUALIO_ENDOFFILE EndOfFile;
00072     VIRTUALIO_CLOSE Close;
00073 } Virtual_IO_t;
00074

00078     int         loglevel,
00079     const char* lib,
00080     const char* fmt,
00081     va_list     ap );
00082 
00083 typedef void (*lib_message_func_t)(
00084     int         loglevel,
00085     const char* lib,
00086     const char* fmt,
00087     ... );

00096 #define MP4_INVALID_FILE_HANDLE ((MP4FileHandle)NULL)
00097 
00098 #define MP4_INVALID_TRACK_ID ((MP4TrackId)0)
00099 
00100 #define MP4_INVALID_SAMPLE_ID ((MP4SampleId)0)
00101 
00102 #define MP4_INVALID_TIMESTAMP ((MP4Timestamp)-1)
00103 
00104 #define MP4_INVALID_DURATION ((MP4Duration)-1)
00105 
00106 #define MP4_INVALID_EDIT_ID ((MP4EditId)0)

00108 /* MP4 verbosity levels - e.g. MP4SetVerbosity() */
00109 #define MP4_DETAILS_ALL     0xFFFFFFFF  
00110 #define MP4_DETAILS_ERROR   0x00000001  
00111 #define MP4_DETAILS_WARNING 0x00000002  
00112 #define MP4_DETAILS_READ    0x00000004  
00113 #define MP4_DETAILS_WRITE   0x00000008  
00114 #define MP4_DETAILS_FIND    0x00000010  
00115 #define MP4_DETAILS_TABLE   0x00000020  
00116 #define MP4_DETAILS_SAMPLE  0x00000040  
00117 #define MP4_DETAILS_HINT    0x00000080  
00118 #define MP4_DETAILS_ISMA    0x00000100  
00119 #define MP4_DETAILS_EDIT    0x00000200  
00123 /* Macros to test for API type validity */
00124 #define MP4_IS_VALID_FILE_HANDLE(x) ((x) != MP4_INVALID_FILE_HANDLE)
00125 #define MP4_IS_VALID_TRACK_ID(x)    ((x) != MP4_INVALID_TRACK_ID)
00126 #define MP4_IS_VALID_SAMPLE_ID(x)   ((x) != MP4_INVALID_SAMPLE_ID)
00127 #define MP4_IS_VALID_TIMESTAMP(x)   ((x) != MP4_INVALID_TIMESTAMP)
00128 #define MP4_IS_VALID_DURATION(x)    ((x) != MP4_INVALID_DURATION)
00129 #define MP4_IS_VALID_EDIT_ID(x)     ((x) != MP4_INVALID_EDIT_ID)
00130 
00131 #define MP4_DETAILS_READ_ALL        \
00132     (MP4_DETAILS_READ | MP4_DETAILS_TABLE | MP4_DETAILS_SAMPLE)
00133 #define MP4_DETAILS_WRITE_ALL       \
00134     (MP4_DETAILS_WRITE | MP4_DETAILS_TABLE | MP4_DETAILS_SAMPLE)
00135 
00136 /*
00137  * MP4 Known track type names - e.g. MP4GetNumberOfTracks(type)
00138  *
00139  * Note this first group of track types should be created
00140  * via the MP4Add<Type>Track() functions, and not MP4AddTrack(type)
00141  */
00142 #define MP4_OD_TRACK_TYPE       "odsm"
00143 #define MP4_SCENE_TRACK_TYPE    "sdsm"
00144 #define MP4_AUDIO_TRACK_TYPE    "soun"
00145 #define MP4_VIDEO_TRACK_TYPE    "vide"
00146 #define MP4_HINT_TRACK_TYPE     "hint"
00147 #define MP4_CNTL_TRACK_TYPE     "cntl"
00148 #define MP4_TEXT_TRACK_TYPE     "text"
00149 /*
00150  * This second set of track types should be created
00151  * via MP4AddSystemsTrack(type)
00152  */
00153 #define MP4_CLOCK_TRACK_TYPE    "crsm"
00154 #define MP4_MPEG7_TRACK_TYPE    "m7sm"
00155 #define MP4_OCI_TRACK_TYPE      "ocsm"
00156 #define MP4_IPMP_TRACK_TYPE     "ipsm"
00157 #define MP4_MPEGJ_TRACK_TYPE    "mjsm"
00158 
00159 #define MP4_IS_VIDEO_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00160     (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_VIDEO_TRACK_TYPE))
00161 
00162 #define MP4_IS_AUDIO_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00163     (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_AUDIO_TRACK_TYPE))
00164 
00165 #define MP4_IS_CNTL_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00166         (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_CNTL_TRACK_TYPE))
00167 
00168 #define MP4_IS_OD_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00169     (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_OD_TRACK_TYPE))
00170 
00171 #define MP4_IS_SCENE_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00172     (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_SCENE_TRACK_TYPE))
00173 
00174 #define MP4_IS_HINT_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00175     (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_HINT_TRACK_TYPE))
00176 
00177 #define MP4_IS_SYSTEMS_TRACK_TYPE(type) \
00178     (!strcasecmp(type, MP4_CLOCK_TRACK_TYPE) \
00179     || !strcasecmp(type, MP4_MPEG7_TRACK_TYPE) \
00180     || !strcasecmp(type, MP4_OCI_TRACK_TYPE) \
00181     || !strcasecmp(type, MP4_IPMP_TRACK_TYPE) \
00182     || !strcasecmp(type, MP4_MPEGJ_TRACK_TYPE))
00183 
00184 /* MP4 Audio track types - see MP4AddAudioTrack()*/
00185 #define MP4_INVALID_AUDIO_TYPE          0x00
00186 #define MP4_MPEG1_AUDIO_TYPE            0x6B
00187 #define MP4_MPEG2_AUDIO_TYPE            0x69
00188 #define MP4_MP3_AUDIO_TYPE              MP4_MPEG2_AUDIO_TYPE
00189 #define MP4_MPEG2_AAC_MAIN_AUDIO_TYPE   0x66
00190 #define MP4_MPEG2_AAC_LC_AUDIO_TYPE     0x67
00191 #define MP4_MPEG2_AAC_SSR_AUDIO_TYPE    0x68
00192 #define MP4_MPEG2_AAC_AUDIO_TYPE        MP4_MPEG2_AAC_MAIN_AUDIO_TYPE
00193 #define MP4_MPEG4_AUDIO_TYPE            0x40
00194 #define MP4_PRIVATE_AUDIO_TYPE          0xC0
00195 #define MP4_PCM16_LITTLE_ENDIAN_AUDIO_TYPE  0xE0 /* a private definition */
00196 #define MP4_VORBIS_AUDIO_TYPE           0xE1 /* a private definition */
00197 #define MP4_AC3_AUDIO_TYPE              0xE2 /* a private definition */
00198 #define MP4_ALAW_AUDIO_TYPE             0xE3 /* a private definition */
00199 #define MP4_ULAW_AUDIO_TYPE             0xE4 /* a private definition */
00200 #define MP4_G723_AUDIO_TYPE             0xE5 /* a private definition */
00201 #define MP4_PCM16_BIG_ENDIAN_AUDIO_TYPE 0xE6 /* a private definition */
00202 
00203 /* MP4 MPEG-4 Audio types from 14496-3 Table 1.5.1 */
00204 #define MP4_MPEG4_INVALID_AUDIO_TYPE        0
00205 #define MP4_MPEG4_AAC_MAIN_AUDIO_TYPE       1
00206 #define MP4_MPEG4_AAC_LC_AUDIO_TYPE         2
00207 #define MP4_MPEG4_AAC_SSR_AUDIO_TYPE        3
00208 #define MP4_MPEG4_AAC_LTP_AUDIO_TYPE        4
00209 #define MP4_MPEG4_AAC_HE_AUDIO_TYPE         5
00210 #define MP4_MPEG4_AAC_SCALABLE_AUDIO_TYPE   6
00211 #define MP4_MPEG4_CELP_AUDIO_TYPE           8
00212 #define MP4_MPEG4_HVXC_AUDIO_TYPE           9
00213 #define MP4_MPEG4_TTSI_AUDIO_TYPE           12
00214 #define MP4_MPEG4_MAIN_SYNTHETIC_AUDIO_TYPE 13
00215 #define MP4_MPEG4_WAVETABLE_AUDIO_TYPE      14
00216 #define MP4_MPEG4_MIDI_AUDIO_TYPE           15
00217 #define MP4_MPEG4_ALGORITHMIC_FX_AUDIO_TYPE 16
00218 #define MP4_MPEG4_ALS_AUDIO_TYPE            31
00219 #define MP4_MPEG4_LAYER1_AUDIO_TYPE         32
00220 #define MP4_MPEG4_LAYER2_AUDIO_TYPE         33
00221 #define MP4_MPEG4_LAYER3_AUDIO_TYPE         34
00222 #define MP4_MPEG4_SLS_AUDIO_TYPE            35
00223 
00224 /* MP4 Audio type utilities following common usage */
00225 #define MP4_IS_MP3_AUDIO_TYPE(type) \
00226     ((type) == MP4_MPEG1_AUDIO_TYPE || (type) == MP4_MPEG2_AUDIO_TYPE)
00227 
00228 #define MP4_IS_MPEG2_AAC_AUDIO_TYPE(type) \
00229     (((type) >= MP4_MPEG2_AAC_MAIN_AUDIO_TYPE \
00230         && (type) <= MP4_MPEG2_AAC_SSR_AUDIO_TYPE))
00231 
00232 #define MP4_IS_MPEG4_AAC_AUDIO_TYPE(mpeg4Type) \
00233     (((mpeg4Type) >= MP4_MPEG4_AAC_MAIN_AUDIO_TYPE \
00234         && (mpeg4Type) <= MP4_MPEG4_AAC_HE_AUDIO_TYPE) \
00235       || (mpeg4Type) == MP4_MPEG4_AAC_SCALABLE_AUDIO_TYPE \
00236           || (mpeg4Type) == 17)
00237 
00238 #define MP4_IS_AAC_AUDIO_TYPE(type) \
00239     (MP4_IS_MPEG2_AAC_AUDIO_TYPE(type) \
00240     || (type) == MP4_MPEG4_AUDIO_TYPE)
00241 
00242 /* MP4 Video track types - see MP4AddVideoTrack() */
00243 #define MP4_INVALID_VIDEO_TYPE          0x00
00244 #define MP4_MPEG1_VIDEO_TYPE            0x6A
00245 #define MP4_MPEG2_SIMPLE_VIDEO_TYPE     0x60
00246 #define MP4_MPEG2_MAIN_VIDEO_TYPE       0x61
00247 #define MP4_MPEG2_SNR_VIDEO_TYPE        0x62
00248 #define MP4_MPEG2_SPATIAL_VIDEO_TYPE    0x63
00249 #define MP4_MPEG2_HIGH_VIDEO_TYPE       0x64
00250 #define MP4_MPEG2_442_VIDEO_TYPE        0x65
00251 #define MP4_MPEG2_VIDEO_TYPE            MP4_MPEG2_MAIN_VIDEO_TYPE
00252 #define MP4_MPEG4_VIDEO_TYPE            0x20
00253 #define MP4_JPEG_VIDEO_TYPE             0x6C
00254 #define MP4_PRIVATE_VIDEO_TYPE          0xD0
00255 #define MP4_YUV12_VIDEO_TYPE            0xF0    /* a private definition */
00256 #define MP4_H263_VIDEO_TYPE             0xF2    /* a private definition */
00257 #define MP4_H261_VIDEO_TYPE             0xF3    /* a private definition */
00258 
00259 /* MP4 Video type utilities */
00260 #define MP4_IS_MPEG1_VIDEO_TYPE(type) \
00261     ((type) == MP4_MPEG1_VIDEO_TYPE)
00262 
00263 #define MP4_IS_MPEG2_VIDEO_TYPE(type) \
00264     (((type) >= MP4_MPEG2_SIMPLE_VIDEO_TYPE \
00265         && (type) <= MP4_MPEG2_442_VIDEO_TYPE) \
00266       || MP4_IS_MPEG1_VIDEO_TYPE(type))
00267 
00268 #define MP4_IS_MPEG4_VIDEO_TYPE(type) \
00269     ((type) == MP4_MPEG4_VIDEO_TYPE)
00270 
00271 /* Mpeg4 Visual Profile Defines - ISO/IEC 14496-2:2001/Amd.2:2002(E) */
00272 #define MPEG4_SP_L1 (0x1)
00273 #define MPEG4_SP_L2 (0x2)
00274 #define MPEG4_SP_L3 (0x3)
00275 #define MPEG4_SP_L0 (0x8)
00276 #define MPEG4_SSP_L1 (0x11)
00277 #define MPEG4_SSP_L2 (0x12)
00278 #define MPEG4_CP_L1 (0x21)
00279 #define MPEG4_CP_L2 (0x22)
00280 #define MPEG4_MP_L2 (0x32)
00281 #define MPEG4_MP_L3 (0x33)
00282 #define MPEG4_MP_L4 (0x34)
00283 #define MPEG4_NBP_L2 (0x42)
00284 #define MPEG4_STP_L1 (0x51)
00285 #define MPEG4_SFAP_L1 (0x61)
00286 #define MPEG4_SFAP_L2 (0x62)
00287 #define MPEG4_SFBAP_L1 (0x63)
00288 #define MPEG4_SFBAP_L2 (0x64)
00289 #define MPEG4_BATP_L1 (0x71)
00290 #define MPEG4_BATP_L2 (0x72)
00291 #define MPEG4_HP_L1 (0x81)
00292 #define MPEG4_HP_L2 (0x82)
00293 #define MPEG4_ARTSP_L1 (0x91)
00294 #define MPEG4_ARTSP_L2 (0x92)
00295 #define MPEG4_ARTSP_L3 (0x93)
00296 #define MPEG4_ARTSP_L4 (0x94)
00297 #define MPEG4_CSP_L1 (0xa1)
00298 #define MPEG4_CSP_L2 (0xa2)
00299 #define MPEG4_CSP_L3 (0xa3)
00300 #define MPEG4_ACEP_L1 (0xb1)
00301 #define MPEG4_ACEP_L2 (0xb2)
00302 #define MPEG4_ACEP_L3 (0xb3)
00303 #define MPEG4_ACEP_L4 (0xb4)
00304 #define MPEG4_ACP_L1 (0xc1)
00305 #define MPEG4_ACP_L2 (0xc2)
00306 #define MPEG4_AST_L1 (0xd1)
00307 #define MPEG4_AST_L2 (0xd2)
00308 #define MPEG4_AST_L3 (0xd3)
00309 #define MPEG4_S_STUDIO_P_L1 (0xe1)
00310 #define MPEG4_S_STUDIO_P_L2 (0xe2)
00311 #define MPEG4_S_STUDIO_P_L3 (0xe3)
00312 #define MPEG4_S_STUDIO_P_L4 (0xe4)
00313 #define MPEG4_C_STUDIO_P_L1 (0xe5)
00314 #define MPEG4_C_STUDIO_P_L2 (0xe6)
00315 #define MPEG4_C_STUDIO_P_L3 (0xe7)
00316 #define MPEG4_C_STUDIO_P_L4 (0xe8)
00317 #define MPEG4_ASP_L0 (0xF0)
00318 #define MPEG4_ASP_L1 (0xF1)
00319 #define MPEG4_ASP_L2 (0xF2)
00320 #define MPEG4_ASP_L3 (0xF3)
00321 #define MPEG4_ASP_L4 (0xF4)
00322 #define MPEG4_ASP_L5 (0xF5)
00323 #define MPEG4_ASP_L3B (0xF7)
00324 #define MPEG4_FGSP_L0 (0xf8)
00325 #define MPEG4_FGSP_L1 (0xf9)
00326 #define MPEG4_FGSP_L2 (0xfa)
00327 #define MPEG4_FGSP_L3 (0xfb)
00328 #define MPEG4_FGSP_L4 (0xfc)

00333 #define MP4V2_CHAPTER_TITLE_MAX 1023
00334 
00339 typedef struct MP4Chapter_s {
00340     MP4Duration duration; 
00341     char title[MP4V2_CHAPTER_TITLE_MAX+1]; 
00342 } MP4Chapter_t;
00343 
00347 typedef enum {
00348     MP4ChapterTypeNone = 0, 
00349     MP4ChapterTypeAny  = 1, 
00350     MP4ChapterTypeQt   = 2, 
00351     MP4ChapterTypeNero = 4  
00352 } MP4ChapterType;
